rotate_lid.description: Rotate the lid to open or close it due to its revolute joint.

rotate_wheel.description: Spin the wheel to generate a spark for lighting the lighter.

wipe_lighter_body.description: Wipe the body of the lighter to ensure it's clean.

clean_lighter_body.description: Clean the body of the lighter to remove dust or any other particles.

press_lighter_body.description: Press the body of the lighter to release gas.

use_lighter.description: Use the lighter by rotating the lid, spinning the wheel, and closing the lid.

clean_lighter.description: Clean the entire lighter, including the lid, the wheel, and the body.

clean_whole_lighter.description: Clean the entire lighter including the body, wheel, and rotation lid.
